question: Name the three major groupings of UVM phases and give one example from each.
Why do components raise objections during `run_phase`?
answer: To keep the phase alive while they still have work; the phase ends only when all raised objections are dropped.

question: How can you allow a monitor time to flush its FIFOs after dropping objections?
answer: Set a drain time with `uvm_phase::set_drain_time` so the phase lingers briefly before ending.

question: Which UVM base class participates in phasing and why?

question: What switch helps you visualize phase ordering and objections in the log?
answer: Enable `+UVM_PHASE_TRACE` to see phase entry/exit and objection counts in real time.
